nodes.text: Drouk were a species of bipedal predatory creatures. They were powerfully built with armored carapaces and large arms. Some Drouks were capable of growing to immense size.
Drouks could be trained to fight in combat and take commands. Several were used in battle by the Warstalkers on Denova.
They were also kept as pets.

Drouks appear as enemies during the Operation: Explosive Conflict mission of Star Wars: The Old Republic, and as bosses. Several varieties were also introduced as vanity pets. Their status as sentient or non-sentient is unclear.
